sourcesContent:
import { Box, Typography } from "@mui/material"
const Summation = ({ breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks }) => {
  return (

    <>
    <Typography>Total:</Typography>

      <Box sx={{ width: '100%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'right' }}>
        <Box sx={{ width: '33.3333%', textAlign: 'center',pr:'1rem' }}>{breakfast.reduce((total, food) => (total + food.cal), 0) + ' cal'}</Box>
      </Box>

      <Box sx={{ width: '100%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'right' }}>
        <Box sx={{ width: '33.3333%', textAlign: 'center',pr:'1rem' }}>{lunch.reduce((total, food) => (total + food.cal), 0) + ' cal'}</Box>
      </Box>

      <Box sx={{ width: '100%' }}>{dinner.reduce((total, food) => (total + food.cal), 0)}</Box>

      <Box sx={{ width: '100%' }}>{snacks.reduce((total, food) => (total + food.cal), 0)}</Box>
    </>
  )
}

export default Summation
